com.tomtom.speedtools.services.lbs.route

Interface RouteEngine

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TomTomLbsRouteEngine

    public interface RouteEngine
    This interface wraps the TomTom LBS Geocoding functionality, found at http://lbs.tomtom.com. The interface is set up to return Futures, because calculating a routing is a pretty lengthy operation, so an asynchronous interface makes sense.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      scala.concurrent.Future<RouteEngineResponse> route(GeoPoint from, GeoPoint to)
      Calculate a route.
      scala.concurrent.Future<RouteEngineResponse> route(GeoPoint from, GeoPoint to, org.joda.time.Duration timeout)
      Calculate a route.

      • route

        @Nonnull
scala.concurrent.Future<RouteEngineResponse> route(@Nonnull
                                                            GeoPoint from,
                                                            @Nonnull
                                                            GeoPoint to,
                                                            @Nullable
                                                            org.joda.time.Duration timeout)
        Calculate a route. No timeout is set.
        Parameters:
        from - Departure point.
        to - Arrival point.
        timeout - Timeout after this period. Null if no timeout set.
        Returns:
        Future response with routing result.
